editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer with a large selection of discount furniture, home accents & mattresses.

originalText.text: KC was such an amazing sales representative. The moment I stepped in the store he greeted me & was very informative throughout the entire process. If he was unsure about a question I asked, he checked the card for clarification. KC was very patient and gave me great advice while trying to figure out the layout I was looking for. He also provided me with water and offered me ice cream. There was another representative, unfortunately I didnâ€™t get his name however he was a tall African American bald male, he was very friendly and helpful as well. He ensured while we looked around we were comfortable & kept my mom & I laughing. Their manager Dimitrios was also very pleasant. Offered me the complimentary services as well and ensured my order was placed without error. The furniture here was very comfortable & affordable. They had a wide range of options and colors. I left with a couch set as well as a dining set. Great deal ! -Princess S.

originalText.text: What I liked about the visit is that you are assisted in a warm, relaxed and non pressured manner.   My antennas are always up for (let me follow you around the entire store) type of help.  Anthony, the sales man was perfect.  In a relaxed, almost nonchalant manner, he introduced the items that I came to look at and then... knew when to let me wander, after offering coffee and ice cream to refresh my critical thinking skills  ðŸ™‚!   It was my first visit to a Bob's store and very well might not be my last for further purchases.

originalText.text: From the minute we walked in Michael was outstanding! He showed us all the specs, broke down the pros and cons of every piece of furniture we were looking at. He gave us the space to decide and test out the ones we were interested in, all while circling back to make sure we didnâ€™t need anything. One of the managers ( sorry I forgot her name) she checked on us often and was great as well. Thank you to the Bobs team in East Harlem for making this shopping experience wonderful!

Highly recommend going in and seeing him for any of your furniture needs!

I was very satisfied with his delivery, Iâ€™m very happy! Honestly the whole staff at East River Plaza was amazing. I am definitely getting the rest of my furniture from Bobâ€™s from now on!
